text: @realDonaldTrump You are a smart businessman & I would never want to think you would play political games with a COVID19 VACCINE...BUT IT JUST DAWNED ON US DUE TO THE RIVALRY WITH ALLEGHENY GENERAL HOSPITAL, AFFILIATED WITH JOHNS HOPKINS, & UPMC, MAYBE YOUR TEAM DOES NOT WANT TO GIVE UPMC THE OK?
